name: NoomiClone
description:
Here is a new version of noomiclone, now you can do regrabs with multiple bars so I made a little bar park and added some textures too. The collisions and the player's joints are still buggy so I hope to figure that out at some point lol, and I probably will restart again before I try putting it up on app stores just to clean it up. But I am happy with the progress :) please comment or dm me with feedback if you have any!

Keyboard controls - left for arch, right for straight, space to tuck, up to let go, and R for reset
